items.title: CPI report shows the inflation rate rose at a 2.7% pace in November
items.description: Economists had expected CPI to rise at an annual rate of 3% last month.

items.title: Brian Walshe sentenced to life in prison for "barbaric" murder
items.description: Brian Walshe was sentenced to life in prison for the murder of Ana Walshe after her sister gave a victim impact statement in court.

items.title: Small businesses face affordability crunch as tariff and other costs rise
items.description: Some small business owners say they're struggling to stay afloat because of higher tariff, health insurance and energy costs.

items.title: Teen inmate captured weeks after escaping prison with bedsheets
